meta.title: From WAX to HATCH
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: [This week](/2025/04/01), I'm building Raddles around acts we saw at Big Ears. [Waxahatchee](https://www.waxahatchee.com) delivered a gorgeous indie-folk acoustic set with just one backing musician that was intimate despite being on the festival’s biggest stage. [Listen on Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/album/5O9TGAJ6Opoya7KCBKKQUA?si=ZryG0PPhT2eo4WpK0CsqMQ)
